name: exclusiveness_callerid
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool most_exclusive_api.
Tool description: Be exclusive ! Only one requester at a time gets access to exclusive content. Exclusiveness is passed on 5 min after it was assigned. The caller that is first to request the api after the previous exclusiveness expired gets exclusive access to the API.
API description: This function checks the exclusiveness status associated with the given `callerid` by making a request to the "most-exclusive-api" on RapidAPI.

callerid.description: A unique string identifying the requester. It should be alphanumeric with allowed characters [a-zA-Z0-9_-] and have a maximum length of 32 characters.
